abstract: New York Jets cornerback Darrelle Revis dominates matchup against Miami Dolphins receiver Brandon Marshall, getting team off to winning start with a 100-yard interception return for a touchdown in Jets 24-6 win.
snippet: Jets cornerback Darrelle Revis, matched up against Dolphins receiver Brandon Marshall, got his team off to a winning start with a 100-yard interception return for a touchdown.
lead_paragraph: Jets cornerback Darrelle Revis, matched up against Dolphins receiver Brandon Marshall, got his team off to a winning start with a 100-yard interception return for a touchdown.

headline.main: Revis Dominates Matchup and Spoils Dolphins’ Plan
headline.print_headline: Revis Dominates Matchup And Spoils Miami’s Plan
headline.seo: Darrelle Revis Leads Jets With 100-Yard Interception Return
